title: Again, I'm having serious FPS drops after today's patch
body:
So, after the 7.22 Lol was working pretty bad for me, FPS-wise. I submitted a ticket, along with other people, and yesterday it was working way better. 
But today it's back at a very low frame rate. I can't click anything that the game starts freezing. I'll submit another ticket tomorrow along with the repair tool log, but it's getting annoying.

replies.body: Could be some bad game files, see if a force repatch through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help.  In the meantime, toss me your ticket number and I'd be happy to check the status for you.  I wouldn't recommend creating another duplicate ticket, it could end up causing delay or confusion.

32550565

The force repatch didn't help. 
Should i try a clean re-installation of the game? It's been on my pc for 4 years more or less, could it be that all the patching messed up something?
Do you have a laptop with dual gpus?
